title: PTI playing politics of agitation for personal interest: Rana Afzal
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 15 (APP):Coordinator to Prime Minister and senior leader of Pakistan Muslim League-N, Rana Ihsan Afzal on Monday said that Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI), leaders were playing politics of agitation in the country to achieve personal interest.
The PTI had been found involved in attacking national institutions on May 9, he said adding that we cannot ignore the participation of PTI in the May 9 vandalism. The PTI must have punishment for going against the State, he said.
In reply to a question about the imposition of Article 6, against the PTI leaders, he said the reference could be filed soon.
To another question, he said that the incumbent government is focusing on reviving the economy and improving the lifestyle of poor people. The government is making tough decisions to provide maximum relief to the common man, he said.
